rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious foyer with traditional Chettinad-style arches, integrating modern touches.

rooms.name: Living and Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan space that merges a living room with an adjoining dining area, featuring Chettinad-inspired decor.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen integrated into the open plan, maintaining traditional aesthetic elements such as wood accents and carved details.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious bedroom with ample storage, designed for the head of the family. Incorporates elements from Chettinad design such as carved doors and intricate detailing.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: Sufficiently sized room for the children, designed with soft, natural lighting and traditional decor.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters
rooms.description: Compact space for household staff, providing privacy while remaining accessible. Designed with efficient layout to maximize functionality.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: Spacious bathroom attached to the master bedroom, featuring modern fixtures integrated with traditional styling.

rooms.name: Common Bathroom
rooms.description: Multi-use bathroom for guests and additional family members. Designed to be accessible from the living area.

openings.description: A grand entrance door with intricate detailing, set on the east side to receive morning light.
Large windows in the living area that allow ample natural light and an open feel. West facing to capture the evening sun, aligning with Vastu for family harmony.
Separate door leading to the servants quarters ensuring privacy while enabling efficient movement. Placed on the south-west corner.
Window in the kitchen area, designed for ventilation and natural light during morning hours, positioned on the south side.

notes.vastu_alignment: The living area faces west to balance energy flow as per Vastu principles. The plot's orientation is west-facing, ensuring that main living spaces receive ample natural light during the day.
notes.local_building_norms: Adheres to local building regulations in India regarding structural design and safety. Incorporates traditional Chettinad styling with modern functionality suitable for a family of four.
